howWeWork.title: How We Work
howWeWork.subtitle: A simple and transparent process, designed so you feel supported every step of the way.
howWeWork.step1Title: Contact Us and Tell Us Your Story
howWeWork.step1Description: We know every story is unique, and we treat it that way. From the very first contact, we listen carefully to understand your situation and accompany you every step of the way. You are not just a client — you are a life story that deserves to be treated with dedication and care.
howWeWork.step2Title: We Evaluate Your Case and Prepare Your Action Plan
howWeWork.step2Description: We analyze your situation in detail and design a personalized legal plan. We present the available options, timelines, and a transparent budget so you have complete clarity about the process.
howWeWork.step3Description: Once you accept the quote, we send you a detailed checklist with all the necessary steps and documents. We accompany you through each task, resolving questions and ensuring you move forward with confidence toward your goal.
howWeWork.bottomCta2: We are here to accompany you every step of the way.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At CM Abogadas we are committed to protecting your privacy and the correct use of the personal data we process. This policy explains how we handle your personal data.
privacyPolicy.s1Text: Any personal data collected directly from the user through this website will be treated confidentially and incorporated into the corresponding processing activity owned by CM Abogadas.
privacyPolicy.s2Text: We process the information you provide in order to deliver the requested service, issue invoices, and respond to inquiries made through our contact forms or WhatsApp.
privacyPolicy.s3Text: The legal basis for processing your data is the execution of the pre-contractual or contractual relationship, or the express consent you provide when contacting us through the website forms.
privacyPolicy.s4Text: The data provided will be kept for as long as the business relationship is maintained or for the years necessary to comply with legal obligations.
privacyPolicy.s5Text: Data will not be transferred to third parties except where there is a legal obligation. We use service providers (such as hosting or messaging services) who may have access to personal data necessary to perform their functions, but may not use it for other purposes.
privacyPolicy.s6Text: Any person has the right to obtain confirmation as to whether or not CM Abogadas is processing personal data concerning them. Data subjects have the right to:
s6Rights: Request access to personal data concerning the data subject.
privacyPolicy.s6ContactNote: To exercise your rights, you may send an email to infocmabogadas@gmail.com.

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPolicy.intro: This website uses cookies to improve the user experience. Below you will find information about what cookies are, what types of cookies this portal uses, how you can disable them in your browser, and how to specifically block third-party cookies.
cookiesPolicy.s1Text: Cookies are small files that some platforms, such as websites, can install on your computer, smartphone, tablet, or connected television. Their functions can be very varied: storing your browsing preferences, collecting statistical information, enabling certain technical features, etc.
cookiesPolicy.s2Intro: On this website we use the following types of cookies:
cookiesPolicy.s2TechnicalDesc: These cookies allow the user to navigate through the website and use the different options or services available.
cookiesPolicy.s2ConsentDesc: We use a technical cookie to remember whether you have accepted or rejected our cookie policy.
cookiesPolicy.s3Title: 3. How to Configure or Disable Cookies
cookiesPolicy.s3Text: You can allow, block, or delete cookies installed on your device through your internet browser settings. If you do not allow cookies to be installed in your browser, you may not be able to access some services, and your experience on our website may be less satisfactory.
cookiesPolicy.s4Text: This Cookie Policy may be modified due to legislative or regulatory requirements, or to adapt it to the instructions issued by the Spanish Data Protection Agency.
